headline.main: BRITISH VOICE REGRET IN LITVINOFF INCIDENT; Teheran-Cairo Plane Refusal an 'Unintentional Discourtesy'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, NOV. 20 (U.P.) -- Foreign Under-Secretary Richard K. Law expressed the government's regret today for the "unintentional discourtesy" shown Maxim M. Litvinoff, new Russian Ambassador to the United States, by the British Overseas Airways in Iran.
